revised_title: Surgical Removal of the Caecum in a Bitch
tldr: The author, William Musgrave, describes the surgical removal of the caecum in a bitch. He details the procedure, including the incision, separation of the caecum from the ileum, and suturing the wound. The bitch recovered well and had a successful pregnancy after the operation, suggesting that the caecum may not be essential for the animal's health.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Veterinary Medicine
